replies.body:
Fortnite copying off another famous franchise?

**_Typical_**

At least this skin wasn't a robot.
I mean, they made the frostwing off of sindragosa in WoW
omega was based off genji from overwatch and  Omega from the final fantasy series
the ragnarok skin is Kratos from god of war 4 with blue hair
I have a list of many other references
